topicTitle: Should we switch back to the old CS:S weapons?

posts.postText: I think personally that we should switch back to the old Counter Strike : Source weapons. They don't lag at all and are classic and great! The new weapons create a ton of lag with the muzzle flash on it.
I'm guessing the kids that don't have CS:S
You need CS:S to play Jail without infinite errors, without the old CS:S weapons..
Would this be the old weapons that are currently on the Bob version of jail or the actual CS:S weapons like in TTT?

In My opinion I think we should switch back because of the constant smoke lag...
I have seen Four people leave so far because their comp cant handle it.so,so sad.
But yeah, that would be awesome if we decided to switch back

>> Would this be the old weapons that are currently on the Bob version of jail or the actual CS:S weapons like in TTT? 

The CS:S weapons from the actual CS:S game, like awp, scout, ak-47, and more
We have ak47s in there. I spawn with one 3-7% of the time.

>> We have ak47s in there. I spawn with one 3-7% of the time. 

That's a real_cs_weapon.
Yeah, but the ak47 you SPAWN with is a real_cs_weapon.  Those are the kind of weapons we're using ATM

Oh
What about the galil and mac10?
I think we should keep a couple weapons, if I remember right... There were no snipers in the original CSS package. I say we keep magnum and scout... but go back to rest.

>> I think we should keep a couple weapons, if I remember right... There were no snipers in the original CSS package. I say we keep magnum and scout... but go back to rest. 
We already went back to the old weapons, but we aren't talking about the regular CS:S weapons...
